#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(int &x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int main() {
	 long long k;
	int n;
    scanint(n);
    int count = 0;
    cin>>k;
	 long long A[n];
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>A[i];
	}
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		for(int j = i+1;j<n;j++)
		{
			if(A[i]+A[j]==k)
			count = 1;
			
		}
	}
	if(count == 1 )
	cout<<"Yes";
	else
	cout<<"No";
return 0;
}
